Title: Tune of Rocks
Text:
Who said music must be played by instrument?
During my time working in the mine, I kept hearing strange sounds. At first, I thought it was the rumored "sound" everyone talked about... But later on, I discovered that these strange sounds actually came from the minerals themselves, and even more astonishingly, they formed a unique tune!
The shape the Tacetite is cut into and the quality of the Tacetite both dictates how this tune goes.
I sorted through the recordings across the years and arranged them into a song, which is now known as "Tune of Rocks".
I don't feel quite vigorous lately... But fortunately the Pioneer Association Radio has received the mastertape of "Tune of Rocks". My wish has been fulfilled!
